elements.name: Successfully create an account with default balance

steps.name: I create an account with CBU 123456789
The account balance should be 0.0

elements.name: Successfully create an account with an initial balance

steps.name: I create an account with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 500.0
The account balance should be 500.0

elements.name: Adding co-owners successfully

steps.name: a bank account, its owner client with DNI "42657569" and another client with DNI "12345678"
the owner adds the other client to his account as a co-owner by DNI
the other client is added as co-owner
the coowner has access to the account
the coowner can't add other coowners

elements.name: Adding co-owner fails by giving DNI not registered with the bank

steps.name: a bank account, its owner client with DNI "12345678" and a DNI "42657569" that is not in the system
the client tries to add a co-owner to his account with that DNI
an error occurs and warns that there is no client with that DNI registered in the bank

name: Add co-owners to my main account

elements.name: I am a successful account holder

steps.name: a client with DNI "42657569" and a bank account
the client is the owner of the bank account
he becomes the one who has the most control over the bank account
the client can add coowners

name: Be owner of a bank account

elements.name: Successfully deposit money into an account

steps.name: An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0
I deposit 200.0 into the account
The account balance should be 1200.0
the deposit transaction is recorded in the bank

elements.name: Cannot deposit a negative amount

steps.name: An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0
I try to deposit -100.0 into the account
The operation should be denied for negative amount
The account balance should remain 1000.0

elements.name: I successfully change the name of a branch office.

steps.name: a branch management and a branch office 123
the management changes the name of the branch office
it will appear in the system with this new name

elements.name: The location of a branch is changed successfully

steps.name: a branch management and a branch office 123
the management changes the location of the branch office
it will appear in the system with that new location

elements.name: Recording all transactions of all accounts

steps.name: a bank and all bank accounts
the bank records the transactions performed by the bank accounts
each transaction is recorded with a correlative number that identifies it, date and time of realization, type of transaction, amount and the accounts involved

elements.name: An account is successfully registered

steps.name: an account officer with his branch, an client holder DNI "42657569" and two co-owners DNIs "78945612" , "1234567"
the account officer registers an account for them
The account officer automatically registers the account with his branch
enables its use for the account holder and co-owners

elements.name: An account is not registered for a customer who already has an account

steps.name: an account officer with his branch office and an client DNI "42657569" who already has an account
the account officer registers an new account for the client
the operation should be denied for trying to create an account to an client who already has an account

elements.name: A cancelled account is registered successfully

steps.name: an account officer with his branch and an client DNI "42657569" who has a cancelled account
the account officer registers the cancelled account
The account officer automatically registers the account with his branch
enables its use for the account holder and co-owners

name: Register an account in the Banking System

elements.name: Branch is successfully registered

steps.name: branch manager and a new branch office with number 123
the branch office is registered by the branch manager
the branch is operational in the system with its respective location, assigned a number and a name.

elements.name: The branch is not registered due to an existing number branch.

steps.name: the branch manager and a branch office with number 123 that is in the system
the branch is registered by the branch manager with a number already owned by another branch.
the operation is denied due to the branch with that number already exists
the branch is not replaced in the system

name: Register a branch in the Banking System

elements.name: A customer is successfully registered

steps.name: a person with DNI "42657569" and his data (last name, first name, date of birth and address)
the person registers as a client at the bank
the client with DNI "42657569" is in the System

elements.name: Unable to register the customer for invalid DNI

steps.name: a person with DNI "42657569" and his data (last name, first name, date of birth and address)
the person try to registers as a client and puts an invalid DNI "123456"
the operation should be denied for invalid DNI
the client with DNI "123456" is not in the System

elements.name: Unable to register the customer by DNI already registered in the bank

steps.name: a client with DNI "42657569" and a person
the person try to registers as a client and puts in a DNI "42657569" already registered in the banking system
the operation shoul be denied due to there is already a client registered with that DNI
the client is not replaced in the system

name: Register a client in the Banking System

elements.name: It is registered in the bank if a client is married

steps.name: a client with DNI "42657569" and date of birth "2000-06-05" and the banking system
the system registers that the client is married with marriage date "2022-02-02"
it is stored in the system if the client is married
the date of marriage is recorded.

elements.name: A client cannot be set as married if the marriage date is invalid.

steps.name: a client with DNI "94464669" and date of birth "2000-06-17" and the banking system
the system registers that the client is married with marriage date "1999-01-01"
the operation is denied due to marriage date is before date of birth
the client is not set as married.

name: Bank want to know if a client is married

elements.name: Successfully transfer money from a account to other account using CBU

steps.name: An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 300.0
account A transfer 200.0 to account B using CBU
The account A balance should be 800.0
The account B balance should be 500.0

elements.name: Cannot transfer more money than available balance

steps.name: An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 250.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 400.0
account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B using CBU
The operation should be denied due to lack of funds in the account A

elements.name: Cannot transfer a negative amount

steps.name: An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1900.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 1100.0
account A try to transfer -500 to account B using CBU
The operation should be denied for negative amount
The account A balance should be 1900.0
The account B balance should be 1100.0

elements.name: Failed transfer due to nonexistent CBU

steps.name: An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 400.0, an account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 1000.0 and a nonexistent CBU
account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B but enter a nonexistent CBU
The operation should be denied for entering a non-existent CBU
The account A balance should be 400.0
The account B balance should be 1000.0

elements.name: Successfully transfer money from a account to other account using Alias

steps.name: An account A with alias "uno.dos.tres" and a balance of 600.0 and other account B with alias "tres.dos.uno" and a balance of 800.0
account A transfer 350.0 to account B using alias
The account A balance should be 250.0
The account B balance should be 1150.0

elements.name: Failed transfer due to nonexistent Alias

steps.name: An account A with alias "uno.dos.tres" and a balance of 960.0, an account B with alias "tres.dos.uno" and a balance of 1230.0 and a nonexistent Alias
account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B but enter a nonexistent Alias
The operation should be denied for entering a non-existent Alias
The account A balance should be 960.0
The account B balance should be 1230.0

elements.name: Sender account cannot transfer if it isn't registered

steps.name: an unregistered account A with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 800.0 and other account B with CBU 123456789
account A transfer 700.0 to account B
The operation should be denied for pending account to be registered
The account A balance should be 800.0
The account B balance should be 0.0

elements.name: Receiver account cannot receive a transferring if it isn't registered

steps.name: an account A with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 900.0 and an unregistered account B with CBU 123456789
account A transfer 150.0 to account B
The operation should be denied for pending account to be registered
The account A balance should be 900.0
The account B balance should be 0.0

elements.name: Successfully withdraw money when the balance is sufficient

steps.name: An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0
I withdraw 300.0 from the account
The account balance should be 700.0
the withdrawal transaction is recorded in the banking system

elements.name: Cannot withdraw more money than available balance

steps.name: An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0
I try to withdraw 1100.0 from the account
The operation should be denied due to insufficient funds
The account balance should remain 1000.0
